toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field indicates that the Sales Order has been closed short. As necessary, the Close Short process reduces the quantity ordered on each line to match the quantity shipped on that line, allowing the order to be closed.

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The Division where the SO is placed, aka Sales Division. In a single Div setup, the Sales Div and the Inventory Div on the SO line are the same. In a multi-division setup, the Sales Div may be different than the Inventory Div. See page help for more info.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Division
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sohdr_div__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__sohdr__c.rstk__sohdr_div__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>SetNull</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Within Rootstock the Division is the core organizational unit. This is typically the plant where the manufacturing is performed as well as the receipt of purchased material. The fulfillment of a sales order is also done at the division level. From an organizational standpoint one way to correlate the Rootstock Division to an organization is to denote that for each Operations Organization there is a Materials Management organization and a Production Control organization – typically within the manufacturing plant (which equates to the Division). In a single division environment, the engineering, sales and procurement is also within this division. In a multi division environment, the engineering may be ‘centrally located’ and it may serve all of the divisions within the company. In that case one of the manufacturing divisions is designated as the centralized engineering division. Also denoted at the division level is the cost method.</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>The Division where the SO is placed, aka Sales Division. In a single Div setup, the Sales Div and the Inventory Div on the SO line are the same. In a multi-division setup, the Sales Div may be different than the Inventory Div. toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, the Handling Amount field is automatically populated by summing the Handling Charges of the Sales Order lines. When unchecked, the Handling Amount can be manually entered on the header record.

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sohdr_sumhand__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, the Packaging Amount field is automatically populated by summing the Packaging Charges of the Sales Order lines. When unchecked, the Packaging Amount can be manually entered on the header record.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Sum Packaging from Lines
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__sohdr_sumpackage__c
